description.value:
Special: Daemon Wep, Unbalanced, Sanctified, Warp Weapon.

Note: Weapon: Axe. Daemon WP 30 (Unaligned Daemon), Bind Str 1. Att. : Howling, Impossibly Sharp. If Daemon ever escapes weapon, will always be hostile. Gain Fear(+1) whenever attacking with weapon. Must be Unaligned to Wield. Sanctified Weapon represents ability to destroy other Daemons.

system.notes: Weapon: Axe. Daemon WP 30 (Unaligned Daemon), Bind Str 1. Att. : Howling, Impossibly Sharp. If Daemon ever escapes weapon, will always be hostile. Gain Fear(+1) whenever attacking with weapon. Must be Unaligned to Wield. Sanctified Weapon represents ability to destroy other Daemons.
